special_text:
You may spend mana as if it was mana of any color to cast cards exiled with Marilye.
[+1]: Exile the top card of each opponent’s library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among those exiled cards.
[-3]: Exile target creature. You may cast that card. If you don’t, return it to its owner’s hand.
[-7]: Gain control of up to five target nonland permanents.
